page.name: Pandora's Cube Choker
page.description: Stylized versions of Pandora's Cube are etched into the silver band of this choker.  The carvings glow a faint green.  Do you really want this thing around your neck?  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Pandora's Cube Choker
properties.description: Stylized versions of Pandora's Cube are etched into the silver band of this choker.  The carvings glow a faint green.  Do you really want this thing around your neck?  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Mystlyk Museum
page.description: A strange, quiet building full of old relics from the time of the human Chaosweavers!  Be sure to gather up anything laying around, it might be useful later on in the quest!

properties.name: Mystlyk Museum
properties.description: A strange, quiet building full of old relics from the time of the human Chaosweavers!  Be sure to gather up anything laying around, it might be useful later on in the quest!
properties.complete: You've GOT to get Riadne back!  She's got the Key!
